item.title: COVID19 Vaccine Registration Guide for Qatar
item.description: The government of the State of Qatar launched a website to register for the free national vaccination drive. However, a significant portion of the population may lack the technical know-how to register themselves. This project aims to bridge this gap and provide easy-to-follow instructions with screenshots for people to register themselves in multiple languages. Click on one of following links to read the guide in your preferred language: How can I register for the COVID-19 vaccine in Qatar?
